ai-patthana8.21:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.21:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to for the sake of crows, nor for the sake of laughing another.
ai-patthana8.21:1.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to the cause, for the sake of veneration, or for the sake of sacrifice.
ai-patthana8.21:1.1_2: Not for the sake of persons, nor do they arise for the sake of speaking.
ai-patthana8.21:2.1_0: Not for the sake of thought, nor for the sake of veneration, conditions give rise to causes.
ai-patthana8.21:3.1_0: Not for the sake of Kings, nor for the sake of veneration, nor for the sake of sacrifice.
ai-patthana8.21:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
